**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-12T17:03:08Z" title="05/12/2016 05:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">May 12, 2016</time> by blacsky33**
[@blacsky33](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129435-blacsky33/): Are you going to update the LK lander when Beale releases the new version?

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, davidy12 said:
> 
> 
> [@blacsky33](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129435-blacsky33/): Are you going to update the LK lander when Beale releases the new version?
> 

why it doesn't work? what will be different?

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, blacsky33 said:
> 
> 
> why it doesn't work? what will be different?
> 

It's smaller (.9375) AND Look at where the nodes are positioned.
ok i will take a look later .

comm.module

yep

SOON ...
For some reason the little hab below the command pod makes me picture a sleeper cab on an 18 wheeler.
I think i found a bug, with the MBI download, i cant get any fuel in them, nothing appears when i right click on them.
all fuel tank are compatible with interstellar fuel switch , use it. if it's not solving the problem, can u be more specific on which tank or all of them ? plz.

![PFFt9QG.png](http://i.imgur.com/PFFt9QG.png)

configs done ... jeb is happy ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")
MBIblackpartsv1.1.2  = [https://www.dropbox.com/s/r1b7dgaw599y4sl/MBIblackpartsv1.1.2.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/r1b7dgaw599y4sl/MBIblackpartsv1.1.2.zip?dl=0)

I was not using interstellar fuel switch, is it needed? Also yes all the tanks had no fuel.

[@blacsky33](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/129435-blacsky33/) You make some amazing looking parts! Well done!

> 
> 
> On 6/14/2016 at 11:28 PM, SpaceBadger007 said:
> 
> 
> i cannot seem to be able to download the octo lander parts from dropbox, all that happens is when i click open is file not supported.
> 

It's a .rar not the usual .zip. Try 7zip or something similar (a dedicated archive program). The link is fine and the file works (I just checked both).

Are the mods 1.1.3 compatible? on <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">ckan</abbr> is says 1.1.2. Also i dont think that <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">ckan</abbr> version has all your sub mods as i cant find the octo lander nor the retro parts
Hi, i have a problem downloading the octo-lander. It gets downloaded as a RAR and i need to use a special tool that comes with it that i have no idea how to use. Help?

> 
> 
> Hi, i have a problem downloading the octo-lander. It gets downloaded as a RAR and i need to use a special tool that comes with it that i have no idea how to use. Help?
